means: 提供，供给( provide的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Return the enclosed Donation Form today in the prepaid envelope provided.
sentence.Network_cn: 请于今日将随函附上的捐款表格用所提供的邮资预付的信封寄回。

sentence.Network_en: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
sentence.Network_cn: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

sentence.Network_en: Bob Marley provided them with their first taste of Reggae music.

entry.def: If you say that something will happen provided or provided that something else happens, you mean that the first thing will happen only if the second thing also happens.

example.ex: The other banks are going to be very eager to help, provided that they see that he has a specific plan...
example.tran: 如果看到他有具体的计划，其他银行会很愿意提供帮助。

example.ex: Provided they are fit I see no reason why they shouldn't go on playing for another four or five years.
example.tran: 只要他们身体强健，我看不出他们有什么理由不继续再打四五年比赛。

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的
e出+vid看,查+ent……的→看出来了→明显的
im不+provident[adj.顾及未来的,有远见的]→adj.不顾将来的,不节俭的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惹人反感的,招人嫉妒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+vid看,查+ious……的→看上去不好的→有害的
pro向前+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
provide预备,提供+ed→在……前提之下→倘若

stems_affixes.value_cn: 红利,股息;回报,效益;被除数,划分
stems_affixes.word_buile: divide[v.分开]+end→划分,区分[红利,股息也是划分出去的]
in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明显;显著;根据;证据;迹象
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+vid看,查+ence表名词→看出来了→明显
pro向前+vid看+ency表名词→向前看→有远见

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电视, 录象, 视频
stems_affixes.word_buile: vid看,查+eo→n.电视, 录象, 视频

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,供给,准备,预防,规定
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vid看,查+e→提前看好→预备,提供

Sentence.sentence: But their beds were provided by private individuals, rather than a hotel chain
The support provided by the regular clients.
With one group of students, the teacher provided strong "scaffolding"―instructional support—and feedback.

Teenagers in Australia, similarly ,said that their mobile phones provided numerous benefits and were an affiliated part of their lives; some were so attached to their phones that the researchers considered it an addiction

Researchers studying teenagers in Israel concluded that, in that hazardous environment, mobile phones were regarded as "security objects" in parent-teen relationships―important because they provided the possibility ofcontact and communication at all times.

sentences.en: Provided it's fine we will have a pleasant holiday.
sentences.cn: 如果天气良好, 我们的假日将过得非常愉快。

sentences.en: I will go, provided you go too.

jushi.english: I will go, provided you go too.
